content: the chevy chase is a fun scarf pattern playing with working on a bias to create chevron shaped ends on the scarf this is great for being thrifty and stash busting you can use 2 left over skeins from a larger project or as many colors as you wish to create a project as unique as you i was impressed how well the mc striping yarn worked up when paired with an ombre cc the wider scarf was made using 3 partial skeins alternating every color change so all the colors got a chance to play both the mc and the cc pattern has an optional fringe you could attach on every odd cc row for added whimsy
